thread.title: Can You Actually Tell The Difference Between Amy Adams And Isla Fisher
thread.title_full: Can You Actually Tell The Difference Between Amy Adams And Isla Fisher

author: Gena-mour Barrett
title: Can You Actually Tell The Difference Between Amy Adams And Isla Fisher
text:
View this image › 
Chris Delmas / Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images / BuzzFeed ID: 10704605 1. Who starred in Enchanted ? Walt Disney Pictures Amy Adams Isla Fisher 2. Who starred in Confessions of a Shopaholic ? Touchstone Pictures Amy Adams Isla Fisher 3. Who starred in The Great Gatsby ? Warner Bros. Pictures Amy Adams Isla Fisher 4. Who starred in American Hustle ? Columbia Pictures / collider.com Amy Adams Isla Fisher 5. Who was in Catch Me If You Can ? DreamWorks Pictures Amy Adams Isla Fisher 6. Who starred in Now You See Me ? Summit Entertainment Amy Adams Isla Fisher 7. Who starred in Bachelorette ? The Weinstein Company / Creative Artists Agency Amy Adams Isla Fisher 8. Who starred in Night At The Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian ? 20th Century Fox Amy Adams Isla Fisher 9. Who starred in Doubt ? Miramax Films Amy Adams Isla Fisher 10. Who starred in Definitely, Maybe ? Universal Pictures Amy Adams Isla Fisher Can You Actually Tell The Difference Between Amy Adams And Isla Fisher? I bet you thought you knew the difference, didn’t you? A lot harder than you thought, wasn’t it?! Take a good look at the two ladies’ faces and try again.
You definitely don’t think they look *the exact same* but still some questions did trip you up. You kinda know the difference though and that’s better than nothing.
You actually know the difference between Amy Adams and Isla Fisher! Well done! You are officially better at telling them apart than most people.
SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10705105 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Gena-mour Barrett is a staff writer for BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
